page.title: 04Housing in Viewpark district
page.content: Viewpark has more council houses than Uddingston. Most of those in Viewpark are in blocks of 4,6,or 8 houses. Each block has 'closes' which are like tunnels going through the block so you can get through to the back garden. Most of the council houses have between two and five apartments;a few have six. There are some flats near to the main road and these have no gardens although some tenants have allotments. There have been some private houses built in parts of Viewpark rec- ently but Uddinston has many more old ones. It has several old large and beautiful red-sandstone villas. There are also some blocks of terraced hous- es built with this stone too. Udding- ston and Viewpark have nice areas but some parts are rather shabby, neglec- ted and dirty looking.
